data.text:
Choose a Staff Member:

Trevor Dinham

Title

Intramural & Community Programs Coordinator

Email

tdinham@uwindsor.ca

Phone

x 4278

The St. Denis Centre is a second home to Trevor, often spending more time on campus than in his own home. Beginning in 2004 as a student intern, he has held various roles within the Department of Athletics in the areas of Sports Information, special events, facility operation, equipment and even working the front desk! His daily function varies depending on the season. In the fall he’s dealing with football equipment, in the winter he is setting up track & field meets and court sports all while helping to keep the building functioning efficiently.

Trevor also spent seven years in the Office of Alumni Affairs doing communication and marketing. There he worked closely with University Administration and the Alumni Board of Directors to produce electronic and print communications, managed corporate partnerships and assisted in the operation of signature events.

He is a graduate of the University’s Faculty of Human Kinetics, holding a bachelor’s degree with an Honours Leisure and Sport Management. He has a three-year diploma in Sports and Recreation Administration from Lambton College and is a Certified Athletic Equipment Manager (AEMA).
